name: RI_1_1_14_Archive_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.14 Archive Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Archive Record Entries (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to create and move archive artifacts containing record entry content, typically to long-term offline storage. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.14.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL archive Record Entries according to function [RI.3](Requirements-DHFPR2-RI.3.html) (Manage Record Archive and Restore).
